Summary: SolarNow, a for-profit social business based in East Africa, has partnered with AWS Partner Eseye to provide solar-powered equipment, appliances and services to remote or off-grid users. Eseye's AnyNet Secure SIM solution and IoT technology on AWS are used to measure device usage and customer behaviour to drive insights into device usage and service patterns, prolong device longevity and improve device performance. SolarNow is using additional AWS services to collect insight into customer usage patterns and proactively maintain devices. By focusing on accessibility and financing challenges, SolarNow provides affordable and flexible credit solutions to widen access to solar energy in the East African market.
